data.title: Episode 155: Marc Allen
data.meta_description: Internationally renowned publisher, seminar leader, entrepreneur, author, and composer Marc Allen joins us to talk about his own unique brand of impact and how he does it all.
data.text:
Marc Allen shares about impact on the Work Alchemy podcast today!Click To Tweet

3 Key Points

Strategic planning can be considered a magical path: you tap into the forces of creation.

We can create a world that works for all.

When heart and mind are focused on a dream, it manifests.

Quote

You’ve got to dare to dream.

What We Talked About

In this episode, you’ll learn:

01:38 – how Marc’s book, Visionary Business, profoundly affected Ursula as a fledgling entrepreneur 23 years ago

02:13 – what’s the meaning of the title of Marc’s latest book, The Magical Path?

05:02 – strategic planning as magic

06:24 – redefining laziness

08:41 – the value of visualizing an ideal scene

10:02 – mastering money

15:13 – mastering time

17:12 – getting around doubts and fears

19:48 – focus on positive outcomes vs. doubts and fears

23:04 – you will fail, let’s celebrate!

24:02 – Marc’s thoughts on impact

27:55 – Marc’s reflections on the impact he’s had

29:40 – a world that works for all: at work and in life

31:29 – profit sharing

35:43 – a triple bottom line

37:30 – transparency about all the good things you’re doing

Actionable Tips

Focus more within and come from the heart.

Follow your inner guidance – it’s the best way to have impact.

Dare to dream.
